programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: (Mill Street Barracks, England, 2021) Built in 1861 Mill Street Barracks is steeped in rich history. It has accommodated many branches of the armed forces throughout its life. Like many other barracks it has also been used as a morgue making it a prime location for the supernatural.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: (San Diego, United States of America, 2012) Get your sun tan lotion on, because we're headed to the land of perfect weather and sunsets. We'll sample a fish taco, climb the 100's of steps of the California Tower, stand on the flight deck of the USS Midway, as well as, revisit San Diego's founding on the San Salvador at the San Diego Maritime museum.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: (Montreal, United States of America, 2012) Bonjour! We're headed to Quebec Province on today's show. First, we get blown away by the thunderous pipes at Montreal's Notre Dame Basilica. After that, we go underneath the city at the Pointe a Calliere archaeology museum. Next, we'll learn about the native ecosystem at the gigantic, indoor, BioDome. Lastly, we'll learn about the 1967 Montreal Expo at the structures that are still visited today.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: (Madagascar, Canada, 2020) Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after you've lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bill's bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: (North Pole, Canada, 2020) Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after you've lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bill's bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: Quirky Science
programme.desc: (Plastic, Singapore, 2015) Plastic has become ubiquitous. Impressive, since we'd been living without them for centuries! We have grown dependent on plastics in many ways. The production industry uses it to connect the parts that make machinery: our trillions of toilet bowls need it, let alone wash machines, computers, toothbrushes, pens and traffic lights. Can you imagine that plastic was accidentally invented for the purpose of making billiard balls? Though, its inventor had used something now called guncotton, which led to a rather explosive game of pool. In the end, the first plastic was discovered when someone witnessed how Southeast Asian farmers used the poop of a little beetle, called shellac, to preserve wood. When looking for a substitute, Leo Beakeland created "Bakelite" and that substance turned out to be the first plastic. Nylon followed, the first man-made synthetic plastic, developed by Dupont to replace silk. Nylon isn't that difficult to make yourself, amazingly. During WW2 all nylon production went into the manufacturing of parachutes, leading Dupont and others to stop producing pantyhose. It led to true nylon riots. Plastics were plain out popular. Indeed, the age of plastic had only just begun. But plastic is made with oil and is hard to break down, which calls for a solution. A company in the US is creating a bioplastic grown inside microorganisms. In fact – soon they'll have plants cultivating plastic… plastic grown in the field? Now that is quirky!

programme.title: Quirky Science
programme.desc: (Internet, Singapore, 2015) The Internet was invented during the cold war and launched in 1969. Yet it wasn't made for the public. In fact, it was developed for the army to communicate quickly and secretly so that no spies could intercept and no bombs could disrupt the sharing of information! It was nothing like we know today. The Internet involved computers exchanging text, on a black field with green letters, and e-mail was only invented 2 years later because the developers needed a reliable tool to communicate. So only in 1972 was this application; electronic mail, introduced. The Internet we know now was actually a second, separate invention, launched over a decade and a half after the Internet was first launched, and was called the 'World Wide Web'. Nobody was paying attention to Tim Berners-Lee and his pet idea, even though he had a radical new way for scientists to share data by linking documents to one another over the Internet! His proposal came back with the words "vague but exciting" written across the cover, so Berners-Lee took his invention to the people: with a website, bringing us the Internet we know today. Yet the Internet is only just out of its baby shoes, and is now being used to drive radical change in music and films, politics and business, changing the very way we see and interact with one another! From the computer screen to mass protests in the street, So what will the future bring us, how will the Web 3.0 change us? A web that can understand human needs?

programme.title: Trouble in Lemur Land
programme.desc: (England, 2011) High up in the mountains of north-eastern Madagascar lives one of the world's most critically endangered primates. There are less than a thousand Silky Sifakas alive today and this area of remote rainforest, known as Marojejy–Anjanaharibe-Sud, is their only home.In the past, the rugged terrain here kept the Silkies relatively safe but things are now changing at an alarming pace. This magical place is under serious threat from illegal logging operations as international demand for highly sought-after rosewood and ebony increases. Unscrupulous logging gangs are encroaching on the Silkies' last remaining habitat."Trouble in Lemur Land" follows two men, an American primatologist and a Malagasy conservationist, on their quest to protect this rare species, at the same time providing a rare glimpse into the life of this extraordinarily beautiful and graceful animal.The film centres around the arrival of two babies in the group – a glimmer of hope in an otherwise desperate situation. Lemur reproduction rates are slow and Silkies only mate one day in the year, so it is a very special moment when primatologist Erik Patel sees the newborns for the first time. He has a permanent camp on the outskirts of their last remaining territory and we are given a rare glimpse into this intimate, close-knit group as the babies develop in the sanctuary of the forest canopy.Meanwhile, taking advantage of long-term political instability, the loggers are steadily extracting Madagascar's rosewood for export to China. Although they are well armed and highly motivated, conservationist Desire Rabary is not afraid to confront them, regardless of the risks. He heads up a network of local people who play a vital role in the survival of the forest and its lemurs. Over the past five years, he has worked hard to actively expose the loggers' illegal trail of destruction but, as this film reveals, the heart of the problem starts on his own doorstep.This 50-minute HD film brings the forest to life, with stunning images of many of its other species, including the striking helmet vanga bird, white-fronted brown lemur, red-bellied lemur, green tree frogs, panther chameleons and the elusive fossa. This treasure trove of endemic Madagascan wildlife is a timely reminder of what we stand to lose if the environmental issues so critical to their survival are not urgently addressed.

programme.title: The Condor Man From Argentina
programme.desc: (Germany, France, 2011) Patagonia, a land of eternal winds and unspoilt nature, is home to the world's largest bird - the Andean Condor, with its average wingspan of 3 meters. In many places, the species has already become extinct. Ornithologist Lorenzo Sympson has been studying the birds for 25 years now. Lately, he has been focusing increasingly on the young animals. This year, he even wants to attach small webcams to the birds' nests that will provide a unique insight into the breeding and rearing behaviors of the rare Andean Condor.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: (Vietnam - The Tunnel Houses Of Hanoi, France, 2017) Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc:
(The Korowai, At the Heart Of the Forest, France, 2017) Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them?
As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: (Singita Pamushana, United States of America) Karina has the fortune of visiting one of the top 10 safari lodges in the world and arguably the finest game reserve on earth: SINGITA PAMUSHANA, in the Malilangwe conservation trust. Karina describes the beautiful lodge and wines and dines in style. Karina experiences mating lions. Karina's adventurous guide Craig Van Zyl leads her to a grumpy black rhino that frazzles her nerves. Craig persuades Karina to observe elephants while they enjoy themselves wallowing in the mud, and they spend a night sleeping under the stars.

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: (Camp Amalinda) Karina visits the awesome Matobo Hills national park. She spends a few days at the magnificent Camp Amalinda, nestled within the caves with the most intriguing character and wonderful views. Karina enjoys Amalinda's delectable signature dish. The very knowledgeable guide, Ian Harmer, leads her to one of the many cave painting spectacles. They go in search of the endangered white rhino and have a brush with near heart failure!

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: (Inn on Rupurara) For a complete change of scenery, Karina continues on her safari in the Eastern Highlands of Zimbabwe at the Inn on the Rupurara, where she is literally on top of the world, with incredible granite outcrops. She views the 2nd Highest water falls in Africa, the Mtarazi. Spencer treats Karina to a walking and horseback safari and she terrorizes the crew with her trout fly fishing technique! Karina walks through a Forest Wonderland armed with a map and takes an invigorating Swim in the pool above the Pungwe Falls.

programme.title: Islands In A Desert Sea
programme.desc: (England, 2017) Baja California - a 1000 mile long desert peninsula. The Sea of Cortez, separating it from the Mexican mainland, is studded with islands, large and small.It's a sea teeming with lifeThe islands may be barren but oceanic upwellings draw in massive schools of fishAnd this richness attracts the inevitable predators. Biologically speaking, this is the richest body of water on our entire planet. The calm waters among the islands are perfect breeding grounds, creatures migrating thousands of miles to spawn their next generation here. Primeval forces draw giants here on an annual migration from frozen northern seas. Other creatures also travel thousands of miles to nest here on tiny dots in the ocean. The sea of Cortez has been relentlessly exploited by man, driving some species to the brink of extinction. Yet this almost land-locked sea also provides evidence of the remarkable resilience of the ocean. And it also shows us how we humans can sometimes make a difference...

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: (Popsicle, Barber Poles, Brain Freeze, United States of America) On a hot summer's day, nothing cools you down like a frozen fruity POPSICLE! You'll learn how an 11-year old boy created this sweet icy treat! And, have you ever noticed those colored spinning poles outside the BARBERSHOP? You'll be in STITCHES when you learn how they got their start! Plus, find out how a melting chocolate bar gave way to the invention of the MICROWAVE!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: (Kitty Litter, Bullet Proof Vest, Neon Lights, United States of America) It was the PURRRFECT idea for making our furry friends more pleasant around the house! You'll learn how KITTY LITTER clawed its way into our homes. And you'll learn how a garment made out of special woven fibers can stop a bullet, plus, why is walking under a ladder bad luck? And finally, we'll CUT TO THE CHASE and explain the history behind this common phrase!

programme.title: Spain's Last Lynxes
programme.desc: (Germany, 2011) 10 years ago, Europe almost witnessed the first dying out of a predatory cat since the sabre-toothed tiger when only about a hundred Iberian Lynxes remained in existance. Still today, the Iberian Lynx is one of the most threatened species of predatory cat in the world. The documentary accompanies animal rights activists in their struggle to preserve and resettle the world's last lynxes. The current plan is to move the cats to safety.

programme.title: Africa's Deadliest
programme.desc: (Lethal Weapons, South Africa, 2011) Hippos

programme.title: Anatolia Land Of the Apricots
programme.desc: (France, Germany, 2010) Millions of golden yellow fruits dry out in the sun. They are called 'Gold of Mesopotamia', the juicy apricots of Anatolia. On the plantations at the shore of the Euphrates grow 95 % of all apricots processed worldwide. But the idyllic atmosphere is deceiving: behind this picturesque façade, seething conflicts erupt among the old patriarchs about more self-determination and, above all, the concerns over climate change and its effects on the harvest are hovering.

programme.title: Save the Bucardo
programme.desc: (Spain, 2019) During many years, scientists and institutions fought to avoid the extinction of the Bucardo, a rare Pyrenean mountain goat. In 2003, Spanish and French scientists managed to clone the last bucardo. It was the first time in history that an extinct animal came back to life. They took a historic step in science, the first de-extinction in the world, the first real "Jurassic Park" and a new door was opened to hope.

programme.title: European Identities
programme.desc: (France, 2017) What is European Identity? Is it cultural or political? Thibault Bourdon travels 8500 Km on his bicycle crossing multitude of dialects & landscapes, majestic mountains, stunning cliffs across the continent exploring this political & economic cohesion of 750 million people. In the end, the project of the European Union is a beautiful idea but, for Europeans.

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: (Cuba - Part 2, Canada, 2022) The incredible Cuba trip continues with a visit to one of the most colorful cities in the world, Trinidad, where Sorin finds the human Google version. After being surprised by a street performer who seems to know too much, the host settles for a few days in Santiago. Here, Sorin is in for a treat and embraces a new group of friends. He visits an African priest who reads his past and future and tells him what he needs to do to better his life. One cannot visit Cuba without referencing Fidel Castro. The host goes for a visit to Castro's unusual grave. Watch the episode to learn more about this culture and its beautiful people.

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: (Costa Rica, Canada, 2022) Spanish is one of the languages that Sorin speaks, so when it comes to countries that he visits for Travel by Dart, a Latino region is a gift. This episode features the only country in the world that doesn't have an army but provides a million happy adventures in between. Mihailovici jumps into a series of adrenaline-rushed activities, from getting to the hardest-to-access waterfall in the world to ziplining and ATV riding. While in Costa Rica, Sorin also finds himself in a crazy, magnetic field, in the middle of nowhere, as his car starts moving by itself up the hill. To sweeten up the things, a full-body massage in chocolate is a bucket list item that finally comes true during the filming of this episode. This incredible scenery brings visual treats to the viewers. It educates them on how Costa Rica and its equatorial climate became a top attraction for the rest of the world after the pandemic. Pura Vida!

programme.title: The Subversives
programme.desc: (United States of America, Chile, Argentina, Spain, Netherlands, 2019) Theo van Boven becomes Director of Human Rights for the UN in 1977, where it was impossible to even name a country for gross violations. No bureaucrat, he battles the most repressive regimes of the late 20th century, such as Chile and Argentina and opens the UN door for the first time to "subversive" survivors from across the world. Risking everything, he even takes on the US and the Secretary General.

programme.title: The Solomon Treasures
programme.desc: (England, 2008) The discovery in Jerusalem in 2007 of a tomb said to belong to the family of Jesus of Nazareth is just the latest in a long line of extraordinary finds which have recently come to light in the Holy Land. But not all these finds are quite what they seem. Both a stone tablet said to come from the Temple of Solomon, and an ossuary apparently belonging to the brother of Jesus, have been declared fakes. The official investigation then uncovered dozens of other fakes, and attention eventually focussed on one of the most revered objects in Israel: the ivory pomegranate. This artefact has been in the Israel Museum for nearly twenty years. Like the stone tablet, it too was linked to the Temple of Solomon – and astonishingly it too, investigators concluded, was fake. As forensic scientists now turn their attention to the ossuaries from the 'Jesus family tomb', Israeli archaeologists are left fearing that history and science is being repeatedly distorted, and they face a challenge to separate fact from fiction.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: (La Reunion, United States of America) Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: (Palm Springs Hiking, United States of America, 2017) Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Trafalgar
programme.desc: (France, 2007) The greatest navel battle in history, entirely recreated in computer-generated images : a grandiose documentary spectacle that takes us as close to historical reality as possible. Thanks to a technological process blending real settings, costumed actors and virtual images, this absolutely unique docufiction relates the Battle of Trafalgar, which brought together 60 ships, 35 000 men and more than 5 000 cannon. A legendary epic, recounted by the author of the French defeat, Admiral Villeneuce, with light shed by international experts.

programme.title: Organic Panic
programme.desc: (Home, Canada, 2014) Is your home making your family sick? From cleaners to carpets, most of our homes are filled with potentially deadly chemicals. New mother Jaya Bone wants to keep her baby happy and healthy, but worries that she can't afford an all-organic house. She visits eco-expert Kym Klopp at her natural lifestyle store. Kym describes key home products and furnishings that can be toxic and identifies organic alternatives. Brendan Seale, Sustainability Manager for Ikea tries to convince Jaya that everything doesn't have to be organic to be safe. Jaya becomes emotional when she struggles to make the best choices for her daughter.

programme.title: Fentanyl - The Unstoppable Epidemic
programme.desc: (Canada, 2016) Canadians' attention has been briefly grabbed by the headline: the story--an abnormally high number of overdose deaths caused by a drug called fentanyl. It merited a few days attention and then was pushed off the stage by other concerns. What Canadians failed to appreciate was that those few headlines offered a foreboding glimpse of what might be one of the most destructive waves of illegal drugs to hit North America since Pablo Escobar flooded the continent with cheap and powerful cocaine. Fentanyl is a killer. And fentanyl isn't just preying on the addict population of this country. Its victims are also Canada's unsuspecting middle-class. And the epidemic is showing no signs of letting up. In fact all signs point to the death count rising as more and more powerful versions of this drug seep into the country.The result, Canadians have no idea what's "slouching" towards them in the near future. Through the eyes of four insiders in the fentanyl industry, Dam Builder Productions will take the audience inside this world in way that will enlighten, outrage, and even fascinate.

programme.title: Underwater Okavango
programme.desc: (South Africa, 2012) The Okavango Delta is one of the richest ecosystems on earth, but most of its creatures are rarely seen by human eyes. They hide beneath the surface, in the intricate underwater world of the Delta. Fearsome hippos and man-eating crocodiles guard these waters, and diving here is considered extremely dangerous. Few humans have ever ventured below the surface, until now. A team of film makers armed with experience and a deep knowledge of animal behaviour have dived the delta for the past year. Their experiences reveal a new, unexplored wilderness that is shaped by passage of the delta's epic winter flood. Every summer, rains that collect in Angola surge down the Okavango River in a giant pulse. Just as the dry season draws near, that pulse reaches the delta, and sets a chain reaction of life in motion. Landscapes flood as the pulse pushes through, and drain in its wake. These forces shape the lives of every creature in the underwater Okavango. The first to feel the effects of the flood are the cave dwellers. The rising tide lifts vast floating carpets of reeds and papyrus off the sand, creating a labyrinth of caves beneath them. Mormyrids and squeakers hunt in the dark, but the live in fear of a far larger predator. Sharp toothed catfish are amongst the Delta's most voracious hunters. They plague the smaller fish, but they in turn are hunted by giant crocodiles. As the pulse pushes into the main delta, tiny fish are sucked into the deep channels behind it. The waters fill with predators that gather to feast on the soup of small fry. The flood keeps pushing further and further out into Botswana, until in the peak of the dry season, it breaks out over dry land. Creatures travel from across Botswana to meet the life-giving tide. Huge elephant breeding herds flee the drought-stricken Kalahari, and walk hundreds of kilometres to reach the flooded delta. Though the water offers life, it harbours death as well. Their tiny infants must navigate crocodile infested floodplains, and face off with lions in the dense reeds. Nowhere is safe, until the flood finally reaches the end of its journey. Just as the rains threaten to bring the dry season to a close, the closing act of the underwater delta launches into action. Birds flock to the disappearing shallows to feast on trapped fish, and the fearsome catfish amass into an army. They charge down the channels by the hundred, and flush fish from the reeds. The stampede of hunters makes the water boil, and entices a new killer to the feast. Fish eagles swoop down one after the other, and snatch catfish from the churning waters. The frenzy of predators builds to a crescendo, until rains finally douse the feast. The wet season marks the end of the flood, but it feeds the beginnings of another. As rainwaters gather once more in the Angolan highlands, the journey of a new pulse begins. This film opens a window on an unexplored landscape of exquisite beauty, and the creatures that must play the daily lottery of life and death within it.

programme.title: The Seawomen Of Japan
programme.desc: (France, Germany, 2009) For centuries, in Japan, mollusc fishing has been a women business. 360° Geo - Report takes a plunge into the closed world of a group of "Ama".For centuries, diving for seafood in Japan has been "ladies work" and is done by "Ama", or "women of the sea". They carry on collecting the precious seafood from the sea bottom until well into old age, braving the depths by the sheer virtue of their breath. Their skin is tanned by the elements, their voice roughened, deep and loud.For centuries, 9 women from the Japanese peninsula of Shima have shared their fate on a boat and grown together to become a close-knit sea-faring family. Kazu Yamamoto, at nearly 80 years of age, is the oldest in the group, a 5th-generation 'Ama'. She has by no means thought about giving up her work yet: "In the sea I can feel and move my body better than a shore. Once in the water all pain disappears, also suddenly my back doesn't hurt anymore", Kazu Yamamoto explains.

programme.title: Tigerfish: Africa's Piranha
programme.desc:
(South Africa, 2014) Legends say they are man-eaters, that even crocodiles fear them. Some say they're the ghosts of the river, "demon fish" that bring bad luck. Few people have ever been lucky enough to see one in the flesh and for angling legend Andy Coetzee, coming face to face with a Goliath Tigerfish is a lifelong dream. He will do almost anything to feed his obsession and unravel the mystery behind Africa's Piranha! Andy has travelled the world in search of the most elusive fish on the planet. He's obstinate, passionate and determined and when it comes to fishing, he's been there and done it all. But one big fish still eludes him – the Goliath Tigerfish! Catching one of these legendary monsters will be the apex of his fishing career. But it's easier said than done. The Tigerfish is rated by sport anglers as the hardest fish in the world to catch. Andy will need his lifetime of experience to succeed on this mission. And he's ready to risk his life to fulfil his dream. His journey starts in the Okavango Delta where he'll brave crocodile infested waters to study Tigerfish underwater. Only a handful of people have ever dived these channels but it's one of a few Tigerfish hotspots on the planet where he can track them down in clear waters. Tigerfish have carved out their niche in some of the most inaccessible habitats on the planet and as a result very little is known about these cousins of the Piranha. Many would say that finding this elusive fish in the deepest river on the planet is almost a mission impossible, but Andy will stop at nothing to reach his goal.
Traveling into the depths of the Congo is like venturing into a lost world. It's no coincidence that it's referred to as the "Heart of Darkness" – this is the land of plagues and river pirates and Andy will have to brave them all to meet his nemesis. Even if he hooks one, there's no guarantee he'll be able to land it. Goliath's are almost impossible to catch – their bony jaws and inch long teeth are impervious to most fishing tackle
Andy's epic quest plunges him into the depths of the Tigerfishes secret realm. His expertise as an angler is taunted and challenged at every cast, but every fresh failure adds to his awe and respect of these legendary monster fish.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: (Hack Green's Secret Nuclear Bunker, England, 2021) The Hack Green Secret Nuclear Bunker is a former government-owned nuclear bunker located at Hack Green, Cheshire, England. It Started as a decoy site for enemy bombers but later developed into a legitimate base. Now it is ripe with hauntings.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: (Vancouver, British Columbia, United States of America, 2012) This episode we visit the bright lights of Vancouver, Canada. We'll swing along the famous Capilano Suspension Bridge, get tranquil in Dr. Sun Yat Sen's Chinese garden, learn about Captain Vancouver at the Vancouver Maritime Museum, dig up Cesna Em "The City Before the City" at the Museum of Vancouver, and dive into the city's seedy underbelly at the Police Museum.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: (Boise, Idaho, United States of America, 2012) We've got our own private Idaho in Boise. We'll tour one of the most stunning buildings in the frontier west at the Idaho State Capitol, dance all night with the Basques at the Basque museum and cultural center, soar to new heights at the Warhawk Air Museum in Nampa, and get a shiver down our spines at the Idaho state penitentiary.

programme.title: Thailand's Elephants, Get Out Of the City!
programme.desc:
(Germany, 2013) In former times, 4.000 elephants and their Mahouts used to work in Thailand's forestry but nowadays, they are no longer welcome in Bangkok. Since then, at the end of the 1980s, when the government stopped deforestation, they have been unemployed. More and more elephant guides have moved to the big cities. For 4 years now, the government has been trying to ban them from the cities, as they are a safety risk for street traffic.
Non Yamdee lives with his elephant Poon Thap in the outer districts of Bangkok but doesn't want to be caught by the police and resettled. He has heard about a new elephant camp in the south – and that is where he intends to go.

programme.title: Mindworks
programme.desc: (The Brian-eye Process, Australia) Understanding how we think and see by playing games with our brains. This factual entertainment series explores the way we see and interpret the world around us with engaging tests, activities, demonstrations and explanations. In each episode we experience visual and audio illusions, sensory puzzles and brain tricks from the worlds of art, science, nature and psychology and learn why they baffle our senses.

programme.title: Mindworks
programme.desc: (Our Amazing Brain, Australia) Understanding how we think and see by playing games with our brains. This factual entertainment series explores the way we see and interpret the world around us with engaging tests, activities, demonstrations and explanations. In each episode we experience visual and audio illusions, sensory puzzles and brain tricks from the worlds of art, science, nature and psychology and learn why they baffle our senses.

programme.title: Fine Cocoa From Esmeralda
programme.desc: (Germany, France, 2012) Cacao Nacional from Ecuador is also known as "Theobroma Cacao" or "food of the gods". The pods grow in the remotest regions of the country, including in small villages along the Rio Santiago and the Rio Napo. Theobroma's distinctive flavor is valued by chocolatiers around the world. The high demand helps cocoa farmers like Lilian and Cleofe develop a new, long-term and more reliable means of subsistence. Cocoa plantations also immensely benefit the environment: cocoa trees grow in mixed species plantations and thereby protect the rainforest. They represent an alternative to palm tree plantations that are highly destructive to the local environment.

programme.title: Bhutan In the Pursuit Of Happiness
programme.desc: (France, 2015) Nestled in the heart of the Himalayas, the small kingdom of Bhutan has decided to do away with the dictatorship of Gross Domestic Product and economic growth at all costs. A new wealth indicator has now become the country's gold standard: Gross National Happiness. Launched by the country's fourth King, the "new paradigm" is based on four pillars: protection of the environment; conservation and promotion of Bhutanese culture; good governance; and responsible and sustainable economic development.

programme.title: Looking for Sultan
programme.desc: (England, 2017) Despite efforts to protect tigers for the past 4 decades, tigers continue to be hunted down - poached, poisoned and squeezed into small pockets of protected forests.Tigers play a pivotal role in maintaining the health of the forest ecosystem and there is an urgent need to protect the tiger and its habitat.In India and across the world, Tigers have captured our imagination for centuries. We have feared them, respected them and even worshipped them. But during the colonial times tigers were hunted in thousands.At the turn of the century over a 100,000 tigers existed on the planet. Almost 40,000 of these were in India. But today only 3800 tigers survive across the world and 70% of these are in India.Today each and every tiger is important and that's why we need to find Sultan.This film follows the story of Sultan, the up and coming dominant tiger of Ranthambore Tiger Reserve who vanished suddenly.Father and son wildlife filmmakers, Mike and Gautam, had been following and filming him since he was a cub and are now trying to put the pieces together to solve this mystery.More than 12 tigers have gone missing in Ranthambhore between 2012 and 2017. Young tigers who go missing are usually thought to have been poached or just lost forever. But the story is much more complicated.Tigers are born in parks and forests - a safe, secure place protected by their mother. But once these tigers mature they must find new homes but the question is where will they go? Trackers on ground have proved that tigers leave the protected territory of national parks to walk great distances in search for new territory. Tigers know no borders and young sub adult tigers must walk hundreds of kilometres to find a new home, prey and a new mate. Once they walk out of the protected area of the forest they are in direct contact with human habitation. People and tigers now share a complicated relationship - one of constant fear of the other.This is the story all across the country. Isolated populations of tigers in small fragmented forests surrounded by human beings and villages. The film looks at broader issues of conservation of tigers and their relationship with the people who share their habitat and the different efforts being made towards conservation in India through the story of Sultan.

programme.title: Bijeg na selo
programme.desc: (Engleska) Dokumentarni serijal "Bijeg na selo" donosi nam priču o savršenim domovima za obitelji koje silno žele pobjeći iz užurbanog, pomalo i divljeg života u gradu. Svaka epizoda serijala bavi se jednim parom ili cijelom obitelji koji pokušavaju pobjeći iz grada i u potpunosti svoje živote preseliti na selo. Pridružite se prezenterima u njihovoj potrazi za domom koji zadovoljava sve uvjete, dok istovremeno istražuju prekrasan i jedinstven okoliš svake lokacije koju posjećuju. Ovaj dokumentarni serijal poziva gledatelja da sazna što sve selo ima za ponuditi te ga vodi u skrivene prirodne rezervoare, zanosne povijesne građevine i upoznaje ga s lokalnim životinjskim svijetom.

programme.title: Rijekama do mora
programme.desc: (Francuska, 2018) Mekong, Mississippi, Dunav, Parana ... Na svim kontinentima postoje mitske rijeke, istinske pozivnice da krenemo prema otvorenom moru. Izvor su najvećih civilizacija, utočište zaboravljenih ljudi, ekonomska i kulturna pluća i fantastični ekosustavi. Francois Pecheux vodi ove rijeke od svojih izvora do njihovih ušća, ciljajući upoznati ljude koji žive na obalama ili na vodi. Oni su ribari, mornari ili farmeri, čuvari povijesti ili nomadi. Od američkih zajednica koje obožavaju Paranu, "roditelja mora", do uzgajivača krokodila na Mekongu, svaka rijeka ima svoju priču. Francois, potpuno otvoren, istraživač avanturist, upada u sve što plovi i rado se zaustavlja na bilo kojem mjestu. U velikim gradovima, u brzacima ili na velikim deltama, koristeći rijeku kao svoju bazu, posjećuje nalazišta i nevjerojatna prirodna područja. Od rezervata prirode na Dunavskom tjesnacu koji je dom velikog broja ptica i divljih konja, do Louisiana Bayousa koji označava kraj Mississippija, samo je jedno što je sigurno: na kraju je more.

programme.title: Ugroženi gradovi
programme.desc: (Venecija, Francuska, 2017) Venecija: Osnovana u petom stoljeću, Venecija je sagrađena na oko 100 otoka povezanih kanalima i s više od 300 mostova. Grad sve češće poplavi, što je izazvalo zabrinutost i političara i znanstvenika, koji pažljivo prate ovaj UNESCO-ov svjetski spomenik. Povjesničari, arhitekti, inženjeri i stanovnici dijele ljubav prema ovom jedinstvenom gradu koji ambicioznim arhitektonskim projektom pokušavaju spasiti grad.

programme.title: Stonehenge: Skrivena istina
programme.desc: (Engleska) Misterije Stonehengea, jedne od najpoznatijih drevnih znamenitosti na Zemlji, već stoljećima fasciniraju svijet. U ovom posve novom dokumentarcu povijest se ispisuje iznova dok pratimo tim stručnjaka koji koriste vrhunsku tehnologiju kako bi istražili golemi, novootkriveni prsten u samom srcu ovog svetog mjesta. U zadivljujućem novom otkriću vidimo kako arheolozi prvi put koriste optički stimuliranu luminiscenciju za utvrđivanje datuma izgradnje velikog prstena, dugo skrivenog u tamnoj zemlji. Saznajemo da, izgrađena prije otprilike 4340 godina, ova divovska građevina predstavlja posljednji, krunski dodatak krajoliku Stonehengea; posljednji mega-spomenik neolitika i simbol kraja jedne ere. Uz današnju najnapredniju tehnologiju laserskog mapiranja, istraživanja dronovima, inovativnu laboratorijsku analizu i CGI mapiranje, ova izvanredna nova otkrića konačno nam pomažu da se približimo otkrivanju tajni Stonehengea.

programme.title: Znanost protiv terorizma
programme.desc: (Francuska, 2019) Tijekom posljednje dvije godine istraživači u matematici, virtualnoj stvarnosti, kemiji, fizici, informatici ili inženjerstvu pomicali su granice svojih područja. Njihov je cilj razviti točniju analizu podataka i pokrenuti učinkovitije odgovore na međunarodni terorizam. Blisko surađujući s donositeljima javnih odluka i sigurnosnim akterima, razvijali su i dizajnirali niz najsuvremenijih tehnologija kako bi spasili živote. Postoje sofisticirani algoritmi za praćenje sumnjivih pojedinaca, olfaktorni DNK, špijuniranje mini-dronova, novih tkanina ili materijala... Ovo nije znanstvena fantastika. Serija ulazi u tajne laboratorije onih koji svoje vještine stavljaju u službu zaštite svijeta.

programme.title: Gospodari građevina
programme.desc: (Francuska, 2017)

programme.title: Tajne sunčeva sustava
programme.desc: (Engleska) Ovaj fascinantan dokumentarni serijal istražuje najveće putovanje u koje se čovječanstvo ikada zaputilo u potrazi za pitanjem svih pitanja: odakle potječemo? Na koji način je stvoren sunčev sustav? Jesmo li sami u svemiru?

programme.title: Priča o Gulagu
programme.desc: (Francuska, 2019) Kao velika politička, povijesna, ljudska i gospodarska činjenica kompletnog 20. stoljeća, Gulag, ekstremno oštar sovjetski koncentracijski logor uglavnom ostaje nepoznat. Povijest Gulaga je dugačka, kompleksna i na mnoge načine neuobičajena. Još od velike revolucije 1917. pa sve do vremena Gorbačova, baveći se razdobljima građanskog rata, velikog terora, Drugog Svjetskog rata, Hladnog rata i smrti Staljina, ovaj dokumentarni serijal opisuje kako je funkcionirao Gulag. Kako i zašto je Sovjetski Savez kreirao sistem kampova za prisilni rad u kojem je više od dvadeset milijuna zatvorenika bilo izrabljivano do smrt? Kroz nevjerojatne sudbine nebrojenih protagonista, s jedne i s druge strane (krvnika i zatvorenika) uz nikad prije objavljene dokumentarne izvore i pomoć povjesničara i stručnjaka, ovaj dokumentarni serijal pokušava nam dešifrirati što je zapravo bio Gulag.

programme.title: Putujući fotografi
programme.desc: (Francuska) Kogis u Kolumbiji, Handzabe u Tanzaniji, Waura u Brazilu ili Papuanci na Novoj Gvineji ... Najljepši fotografski zapisi tradicionalnih društava uvijek su plod velike ljubavne priče između fotografa i dijela svijeta koji mu je posebno drag. Ova vas serija poziva na izlet, gdje pratimo pet poznatih fotografa koji imaju snažnu emocionalnu vezu s tradicionalnim zajednicama koje dokumentiraju već nekoliko desetljeća. Svaka epizoda daje vam priliku da budete dio ove jedinstvene veze, da otkrijete malo poznate kulture i da pogledate rad fotografa iza kulisa. Na temelju ove fotografske potrage, svaka epizoda obećava otkriće teško dostupnog tradicionalnog društva, zahvaljujući snažnom prijateljstvu između fotografa i člana zajednice, prikazujući rad fotografa, njegov umjetnički pristup i njegovu estetsku viziju.

Kroz nevjerojatne sudbine nebrojenih protagonista, s jedne i s druge strane (krvnika i zatvorenika) uz nikad prije objavljene dokumentarne izvore i pomoć povjesničara i stručnjaka, ovaj dokumentarni serijal pokušava nam dešifrirati što je zapravo bio Gulag.

programme.title: Putujući fotografi
programme.desc: (Francuska) Kogis u Kolumbiji, Handzabe u Tanzaniji, Waura u Brazilu ili Papuanci na Novoj Gvineji ... Najljepši fotografski zapisi tradicionalnih društava uvijek su plod velike ljubavne priče između fotografa i dijela svijeta koji mu je posebno drag. Ova vas serija poziva na izlet, gdje pratimo pet poznatih fotografa koji imaju snažnu emocionalnu vezu s tradicionalnim zajednicama koje dokumentiraju već nekoliko desetljeća. Svaka epizoda daje vam priliku da budete dio ove jedinstvene veze, da otkrijete malo poznate kulture i da pogledate rad fotografa iza kulisa. Na temelju ove fotografske potrage, svaka epizoda obećava otkriće teško dostupnog tradicionalnog društva, zahvaljujući snažnom prijateljstvu između fotografa i člana zajednice, prikazujući rad fotografa, njegov umjetnički pristup i njegovu estetsku viziju.

programme.title: Grand designs: Australija
programme.desc: (Australija) Spin-off britanske inačice, "Grand Designs: Australia" pokazuje gledateljima napore graditelja koji pokušavaju podići posebne kuće i domove, specijalno osmišljene prema idejama i nacrtima vlasnika te razne izazove i prepreke kojima se suočavaju graditelji. Kroz show nas vodi arhitekt Peter Maddison, koji se sastaje s vlasnicima koji pokazuju svoje originalne zamisli, nakon čega slijedi CAD (Computer Aided Design) s izgledom konstrukcije projekta. Kako izgradnja napreduje, Maddison odlazi na mjesto događanja kako bi razgovarao s klijentima gradnje i intervjuirao još neke ljude važne za projekt, poput arhitekata i voditelja gradilišta. Na kraju posjećuje kuću kada je gradnja završena te razgovara s vlasnicma o njhovom životu u novoj kući iz snova te svim izazovima koje su uspjeli prevladati za vrijeme trajanja realizacije novog doma.

programme.title: Noćna smjena
programme.desc: (SAD, 2015) Bolnica je u stanju pripravnosti nakon eksplozije zgrade i mnogo ranjenih. Na mjestu nesreće Drew i TC susreću čovjeka koji je pomogao nekolicini žrtava iako nije prijavljeni bolničar. Otkrivaju da je radio u vojsci, poput TC-ja i Drewa, ali je bio spriječen u bavljenju poslom nakon povratka iz Afganistana. Paulov otac, poznati kirurg, posjećuje bolnicu i počinje preuzimati kontrolu, što živcira Scotta i druge. TC i Jordan zbližavaju se dok rade planove za dolazak svog djeteta.

programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2021) Drago se upusti u još jednu bitku za reklamacijama i naleti na starog poznanika iz Tamarinog života - Denisa. Boris i Jadranko odlaze u noćni provod s Martinom, a njegova ih životna filozofija obojicu natjera da preispitaju svoje veze. Jadranko i Tamara odlučuju sporazumno isprobati otvoreni brak, a Boris i Ana se suočavaju s posljedicama svoje monogamije tako da se iznova upoznaju.

programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2023) S obzirom na stanje u svlačionici, Sonja i Slavko imaju ponudu za Gorana koja bi ga mogla interesirati. Bubalu je sponzorstvo upitno, a afera između Zvonimira i Danice moglo bi ga upropastiti. Zdenka smišlja tko će biti naslovno lice reklame. Mirko i Nives imaju plan za Telca.

programme.title: Večera za 5
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2024) Frizer Gabrijel Katalenić ugostit će protukandidate četvrtog dana 'Večere za 5'. Ekipu će dočekati u mjestu Đurđic pored Križevaca, a prijavio se jer voli kuhati, obožava društvene mreže te kamere. Obožavatelj je mesa, a izbjegava ribu, riblja jela te povrće.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen Hrvatska
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2024) Pred timovima su čak dva zadatka. Prvi je test brzine i poznavanja anatomije u kojem će se rijetko tko dobro snaći, a chef Gretić potrudit će se kako bi dodatno zapaprio - i pobjednicima i gubitnicima! U velikom mesnom izazovu svatko će pripremati jelo po izboru, a nepredviđenih situacija, kritika, međusobnog pomaganja i improvizacije neće nedostajati. Na chefove opaske i upite neki će kandidati imati spreman odgovor i opravdanje, no njega to neće previše zanimati pa će njegovi komentari jedne ''zaboljeti'', a druge dobro nasmijati. Jedan će tim nadmoćno pobijediti u izazovu i osvojiti nagradu kakvoj se ni u snu nisu nadali.

programme.title: Večera za 5
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2024) "Večera za 5" je zabavna lifestyle emisija natjecateljskog karaktera. Svaki tjedan pet kandidata imat će priliku predstaviti se gledateljima kroz svoje kulinarsko umijeće kao i kroz svoj osobni smisao za estetiku i male trikove aranžiranja stola i samih jela. Osim tradicionalnih hrvatskih specijaliteta, natjecatelji će eksperimentirati i s modernim delicijama od kojih rastu zazubice. Prednost za svakog kandidata je što kuhaju u udobnosti vlastitog doma po svojim receptima, sastavljajući menije i radeći ugođaj po svom izboru. Ono što će im otežati posao je jedno od pravila igre po kojemu kandidati kuhaju za četvero svojih protukandidata koji moraju biti pravedni u ocjenjivanju, ali u isto vrijeme moraju paziti da im pobjeda ne izmakne iz ruku.

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen Hrvatska
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2024) Na rasporedu je nova večera za goste koji dolaze u restoran. Nakon još jednog neuspjeha i kritika chefa Gretića da ne surađuju dovoljno, plavci su spremni konačno završiti sve sljedove i pokazati da mogu i znaju. Kad servis krene, krenut će i prve pogreške, chef Gretić požurivat će i kritizirati, a neke kandidate čak i poslati na ''hlađenje''. Samo jedan tim uspješno će završiti servis, dok će drugi uspjeti poslužiti jedan tek jedini stol prije nego što budu protjerani u kuću. Uz to, slijede nove nominacije, a jedna osoba zauvijek će napustiti show. Dan će završiti žestokom svađom.

programme.title: Stanje nacije
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2024)

programme.title: Kontakt
programme.desc: (SAD, 1997) Ellie Arroway (Jodie Foster) u naizgled je beznadnoj potrazi za dokazima postojanja života u svemiru. Iako joj karijera stoji na mjestu, njezine oči uvijek su uperene prema nebu. Ellin nadređeni, Drumlin (Tom Skerritt), uskoro zaustavlja projekt, a Elllie putuje u Novi Meksiko na alternativnu istraživačku lokaciju. Upoznaje mladog Palmera (Matthew McConaughey) i upusti se u kratku vezu s njim, no zapanjujuća vijest od kolega vraća je natrag u Ameriku - primljen je nepobitan signal izvanzemaljske inteligencije! Ellie uskoro shvati da je poruka zapravo nacrt svemirskog broda…

programme.title: To je Voyo
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Voyo svojim korisnicima pruža jedinstveno iskustvo streamanja - raznovrstan i recentan sadržaj, gledanje bez reklama, fantastičnu opciju da pogledaju svoj omiljeni show 24 sata prije prikazivanja na televiziji te brojne druge mogućnosti! Na novoj RTL-ovoj streaming platformi Voyo korisnici mogu gledati sve RTL-ove kanale uživo, a očekuje ih čak 1500 različitih naslova – širok izbor novih filmova svih žanrova, kao i poznati filmski klasici, strane serije te regionalni hitovi, vrhunski dokumentarci, sportski i glazbeni megaspektakli, najveći reality showovi i bogat dječji sadržaj.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: (SAD, 2005) U Seattleu, u periodu od svega četiri mjeseca, nestalo je pet žena pa je odjel pozvan u potragu za serijskim ubojicom. Osumnjičeni za nestanak žena je priveden, no njegov profil ne odgovara zločincu. Agenti ubrzo zaključe da on vjerojatno ima partnera u zločinu pa ga moraju uloviti prije nego što ponovno ubije. U međuvremenu, agentica iz Seattlea, Elle Greenaway, pomaže timu, nadajući se da može dobiti posao u specijalnoj jedinici.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: (SAD, 2005) Istražitelji nastoje uloviti serijskog palikuću koji terorizira studenski dom u Arizoni. Većina je dokaza izgorjela u vatri pa se Gideon i agenti moraju osloniti na psihološku analizu kako bi identificirali krivca.

programme.title: Top.HR
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2024) U emisiji će biti brojni izvođači domaće glazbene scene, ali će se otkriti i najrelevantnija glazbena lista singlova u Hrvatskoj i inozemstvu. Svake nedjelje ugostiti će autore i izvođače domaće glazbene scene te gledatelje informirati o listi najslušanijih domaćih singlova, novim koncertima, videospotovima i premijerama.

programme.title: Alov svijet
programme.desc: (SAD, 2021) Prijateljstvo između marinca Rileya (Parker Young) i prevoditelja Awalmira (Adhir Kalyan) započelo je u Afganistanu kada je Al (Awalmir) Rileyu pomagao dok je služio vojni rok. Sada se nerazdvojni prijatelji navikavaju na normalan život u Columbusu, u Ohiju. Doselivši se Rileyu, Al upozna njegovog oca Arta (Dean Norris) i suprugu Vanessu (Kelli Goss), od koje se Riley razvodi i koja dobiva skrbništvo nad njihovom kćerkom Hazel (Farrah Mackenzie). Al zna da Rileyu nije lako živjeti bez svojih najbližih dok se pokušava priviknuti na miran život jer su ratne traume ostavile dubok trag. Al pokušava ponovno pomoći svojem prijatelju nastojeći ujediniti njegovu obitelj.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: (SAD, 2013) Dok oni nadgledaju L.A., svi su sigurni. G. Callenu (Chris O'Donnell), poznatom kao Legenda, dodijeljen je ogranak NCIS-a, Ured za posebne projekte. Pod budnim okom operativne menadžerice Henriette "Hetty" Lange (Linda Hunt), Callen vodi elitni tim tajnih agenta protiv raznih neprijatelja. Ekipu također čine specijalna agentica Kensi Blye (Daniela Ruah), stručnjakinja za borbu, obučena snajperistica i briljantna forenzičarka, bivši Callenov partner i Navy SEAL komandos Sam Hanna (LL Cool J), tehnički analitičar Eric Bartholomew Beale III (Barrett Foa) i bivša tajna agentica i izvršna pomoćna direktorica NCIS-a za pacifičke operacije Shay Mosley (Nia Long).

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: (SAD, 2013) Mornarica može mirno spavati. Kad god je počinjen zločin povezan s mornaricom, istraga je povjerena elitnom ogranku mornaričke kriminalističke službe na čelu s autoritativnim specijalnim agentom Leroyjem Jethro Gibsom (Mark Harmon), koji je oko sebe okupio vrhunski tim istražitelja. Kriminalistički istražitelj ne koristi uobičajene metode kako bi uhvatio zločince i riješio slučaj pa uz sebe želi samo ljude kojima beskrajno vjeruje. Dio njegova tima su bivši detektiv za ubojstva Anthony DiNozzo (Michael Weatherly), koji ima neprestanu želju za dokazivanjem svom nadređenom, iznimno talentirani računalni stručnjak Timothy McGee (Sean Murray), dr. Donald Mallard (David McCallum), glavni patolog koji je diplomirao i psihologiju pa timu pomaže i svojim analizama te osebujna forenzička stručnjakinja Abby Sciuto (Pauley Perrette), koju Jethro obožava poput kćeri.

programme.title: CSI: Las Vegas
programme.desc: (SAD, Kanada, 2013) Tijekom istrage brutalnog ubojstva tinejdžera koji se bavio motocrossom, tim naiđe na muškarca i njegovu kćer koji žive u ilegalnom podzemnom bunkeru.

programme.title: CSI: Las Vegas
programme.desc: (SAD, Kanada, 2013) Ubojstvo brata i sestre te dvoje provalnika povezano je s kompleksnom osvetom. Također, za vrijeme istrage u prtljažniku automobila pronađeno je napola trulo tijelo čovjeka. Russell pokušava doći do jedinog svjedoka, šestogodišnje djevojčice.

programme.title: Zabranjena ljubav
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Blizanci Petra Novak i Danijel Lončar, razdvojeni odmah nakon rođenja, ne znaju jedno za drugo, odrastaju u različitim obiteljima, no povezuje ih snažan osjećaj da im nešto nedostaje zbog čega njihov život nije potpun. Dvadeset godina kasnije sudbonosan susret budi nagomilane osjećaje, Petra i Danijel se zaljubljuju i napokon pronalaze ono "nešto" što im je nedostajalo cijeli život. No kada se otkrije istina, njihova ljubav postaje zabranjena, uništava im snove, otkriva uznemirujuće tajne i budi dugo potiskivane strasti koje su ih razdirale.

programme.title: Zabranjena ljubav

programme.title: Pervanov dnevnik
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Za izgradnju vlastitog stava svaki građanin nužno treba pravodobnu, ako je potrebito, čak i istinitu informaciju. Angažirani su svjetski ugledni novinarski tehničari, ing. Želimir Kučina (Željko Pervan) i ing. Živojin Mirić (Mladen Horvat) da svojim briljantnim perom oslikaju hrvatsku regionalnu i globalnu stvarnost. Zahvaljujući mreži jataka i doušnika, inženjeri se uspijevaju infiltrirati u sve institucije države i na taj način pružiti narodu pravu sliku stanja u državi, a i šire. Uz Željka Pervana i Mladena Horvata u emisijama će se pojavljivati i dopisnici: Milan Pavlović iz Sarajeva te Edi

programme.title: Sudnica
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) RTL na male ekrane donosi "Sudnicu" - svjetski uspješan format koji će zadovoljiti apetite širokog gledateljstva najzanimljivijim primjerima iz domaće sudske prakse! Teško je i naslutiti kakvi se sve slučajevi iz grane obiteljskog prava skrivaju na policama sudskih arhiva: najbizarniji oblici bračnih nevjera, nesmiljene borbe za skrbništvo nad djecom, borba za naslijeđe nekad idiličnih parova, samo su neke od tema koje obrađuje "Sudnica". Uloge boraca za svoja prava dodijeljene su "običnim" ljudima bez glumačkog iskustva, dok će slučajeve voditi osobe iz pravne struke, što emisiji daje dodatnu uvjerljivost. Sudnicom uvjerljivo vlada sudac Ivan Gajski - markantan muškarac velikog iskustva, strpljiv, staložen i prije svega pravedan. Spreman je donijeti odluku koja ne oduševljava njegovu okolinu, a u tome je odlučan i nepokolebljiv. Optužba i obrana u rukama su fantastičnih odvjetnika: Barbare Gabrić i Matije Jurlina. Barbara Gabrić mlada je i atraktivna odvjetnica u usponu karijere i za svoju se stranku bori s puno žara, a nerijetko preokrene tijek suđenja iznošenjem novih informacija za trajanja samog procesa. Matija Jurlin, pak, ispunjava show svojom neiscrpnom energijom. Taj odlučni odvjetnik ne preže ni pred čim kako bi dokazao i potkrijepio tvrdnje svoje stranke pa su mu verbalna prepucavanja i nadmudrivanja s odvjetnicom Gabrić poseban izazov. Od svjedoka suprotne strane ponekad u zadnji tren izvlači informacije korisne za svog klijenta.

programme.title: K.T. 2
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Troje policijskih inspektora bori se protiv zločina o kakvima ste do sada čitali samo u novinama. Viši inspektor Ivan Primorac, inspektori Leon Lučić i Anja Morić iskusni su policajci koji će vas kroz napeti polusatni ritam otkrivanja zločina uvesti u tajne kriminalističke istrage; forenzike, ispitivanja svjedoka i praćenja osumnjičenika. Osnova formata je lažni dokumentarizam: mješavina fikcije i dokumentarnog prikazivanja.

programme.title: Krv nije voda
programme.desc: (Seksi kći se nabacuje maminom dečku, Hrvatska, 2011) Osamnaestogodišnja atraktivna Jana priuštit će svojoj majci Kristini najveće razočaranje u životu. Kada trideset osmogodišnja majka primijeti da joj vlastita kćer svjesno zavodi dečka Antonia, već je malo kasno. Iako bi Kristina rado sve zaboravila i oprala ruke od cijele situacije, problemi nikako ne prestaju. Hoće li Kristina potpuno izgubiti odnos sa svojim djetetom?

programme.title: Krv nije voda
programme.desc: (Kolerični sin izluđuje svoju majku, Hrvatska, 2011) Majka Mira (41) ima veliki problem sa svojim nezaposlenim sinom Filipom. Osamnaestogodišnjak je kolerik i ima česte napade bijesa, baš kao što je prije imao i njegov otac Andro, s kojim Mira više ne živi. Kad se svađa, Filip uništava stvari, viče i agresivan je, a zbog njegovih ispada, najmodavac Duško (58) želi da njih dvoje napuste stan. Mira je pri kraju sa strpljenjem, a njezin sin odbija otići na terapiju koja mu je prijeko potrebna. Čak i kćer Anđela (20) pokušava davati podršku majci, ali nitko se ne suprotstavlja agresivnom Filipu.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: (SAD, 2011) Leonard prihvaća ponudu i odlazi s Penny na platonski spoj u kino. No razgovor skrene na njezinog bivšeg, što stvori napetost, a kasnije i svađu. Penny otkriva da joj se zapravo sviđa Leonardova neotesanost, a on smatra da bi nakon svega ipak trebali završiti u krevetu.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: (SAD, 2011) Saznavši da su Amy i Stuart otišli na spoj, Sheldon postaje ljubomoran. Nakon razgovora s Penny, on prekida njihov spoj i upita Amy bi li htjela biti njegova djevojka, što ona sa zadovoljstvom prihvaća, te se kasnije oduševi Sheldonovom idejom o sklapanju "Ugovora o vezi".

programme.title: Dva i pol muškarca
programme.desc: (SAD, 2008) Charlie sretne bivšu djevojku, majku malenog Chucka, čiji izgled, odjeća i ponašanje nevjerojatno podsjećaju na Charlieja. Alan uživa u ismijavanju brata koji isprva negira mogućnost da je biološki otac tog djeteta jer je koristio kondom tijekom seksa.

programme.title: Dva i pol muškarca
programme.desc: (SAD, 2008) Alan posudi Charlieju 38 dolara, koje Charlie ne namjerava vratiti. Ujedno optuži brata da je škrtac te njega i sina izbaci iz kuće. Alan i Jake privremeno ostanu kod ljute Judith i njezinog supruga Herba, koji će ih uskoro također morati izbaciti na ulicu.

programme.title: Prijatelji
programme.desc: (SAD, 2001) Oni su poput druge obitelji. Radnja serije prati šest likova; Rachel, Monicu, Phoebe, Joeyja, Chandlera i Rossa, koji žele ostvariti svoje snove u velikom gradu New Yorku i spontano postanu prijatelji za cijeli život. Rachel se želi baviti modom, Monica sanja o kuharskoj karijeri, Joey daje sve od sebe da postane slavni glumac, Ross je paleontolog koji nikako da ostvari sreću u ljubavi, Phoebe je uistinu imala težak život, no to je ne sprečava da bude jedna od najpozitivnijih osoba u seriji, a Chandler radi u velikoj korporaciji i ima sarkastičan pogled na svijet. Prijatelji doživljavaju brojne komične i romantične avanture, a okosnica njihove zanimljive svakodnevice svakako su odnosi među njima.

Kriminalistički istražitelj ne koristi uobičajene metode kako bi uhvatio zločince i riješio slučaj pa uz sebe želi samo ljude kojima beskrajno vjeruje. Dio njegova tima su bivši detektiv za ubojstva Anthony DiNozzo (Michael Weatherly), koji ima neprestanu želju za dokazivanjem svom nadređenom, iznimno talentirani računalni stručnjak Timothy McGee (Sean Murray), dr. Donald Mallard (David McCallum), glavni patolog koji je diplomirao i psihologiju pa timu pomaže i svojim analizama te osebujna forenzička stručnjakinja Abby Sciuto (Pauley Perrette), koju Jethro obožava poput kćeri.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: (SAD, 2013) Dok oni nadgledaju L.A., svi su sigurni. G. Callenu (Chris O'Donnell), poznatom kao Legenda, dodijeljen je ogranak NCIS-a, Ured za posebne projekte. Pod budnim okom operativne menadžerice Henriette "Hetty" Lange (Linda Hunt), Callen vodi elitni tim tajnih agenta protiv raznih neprijatelja. Ekipu također čine specijalna agentica Kensi Blye (Daniela Ruah), stručnjakinja za borbu, obučena snajperistica i briljantna forenzičarka, bivši Callenov partner i Navy SEAL komandos Sam Hanna (LL Cool J), tehnički analitičar Eric Bartholomew Beale III (Barrett Foa) i bivša tajna agentica i izvršna pomoćna direktorica NCIS-a za pacifičke operacije Shay Mosley (Nia Long).

programme.title: Chicago u plamenu
programme.desc: (Loše za dušu, SAD, 2016) Serija "Chicago u plamenu" donosi nam priče iz privatnog i poslovnog života čikaških vatrogasaca i bolničara. Kada zasvira sirena za uzbunu ili kada zaprime poziv upomoć, oni svoje osobne probleme ostavljaju po strani kako bi pomogli drugima.

programme.title: Chicago u plamenu
programme.desc: (Dva T, SAD, 2016) Serija "Chicago u plamenu" donosi nam priče iz privatnog i poslovnog života čikaških vatrogasaca i bolničara. Kada zasvira sirena za uzbunu ili kada zaprime poziv upomoć, oni svoje osobne probleme ostavljaju po strani kako bi pomogli drugima.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: (SAD, 2005) Agenti su na tragu bombašu koji terorizira Palm Beach u Floridi. Zaključe da kriminalac kopira postupke Gideonova neprijatelja Adriana Balea (Tim Kelleher), čovjeka koji je kriv za smrt Gideonova tima prije par mjeseci u Bostonu. Kada se talac pojavi s eksplozivom oko vrata, Gideon mora nevoljko pitati Balea kako deaktivirati bombu.

programme.title: Zločinački umovi
programme.desc: (SAD, 2005) Istražitelji putuju u San Diego kako bi zaustavili serijskog silovatelja i ubojicu, koji žrtvama sljepljuje očne kapke nakon zločina. Monstrum dobro poznaje kvart pa ga lokalna policija ne može locirati. U međuvremenu, Reid slavi rođendan.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: (SAD, 2011) Jimmy Speckerman, bivši školski kolega zlostavljač, susretne Leonarda i predloži mu da bi trebalo napraviti naočale koje svaki film pretvaraju u 3D verziju. Sheldon se suprotstavlja Speckermanu umjesto Leonarda, sastavljajući Leonardovu listu žalbi na ranija maltretiranja.

programme.title: Teorija velikog praska
programme.desc: (SAD, 2012) Veza Amy i Sheldona dolazi u krizu kada u prestižnom časopisu objave Amyn članak, a Sheldon na to nikako ne reagira. Nakon što ga Penny upita o tome, Sherldon joj govori da se ne može natjerati da glumi oduševljenje, kad nema dobro mišljenje o biologiji.

programme.title: Dva i pol muškarca
programme.desc: (SAD, 2008) U želji da proširi svoje znanje i poboljša seksualni život, Charlie odluči otići na tečaj kuhanja. Za to vrijeme će Alan i Jake pokušati oponašati Charliejev život tako što će izlaziti istodobno s dvije žene (Alan) i napiti se do besvijesti (Jake).

programme.title: Dva i pol muškarca
programme.desc: (SAD, 2008) Alanov automobil je kod mehaničara pa Charlie mora voziti Alana na posao i s posla kući. Charlieju se takav raspored nikako ne sviđa, ali samo dok ne upozna Alanovu recepcionerku Melissu. Alan pokušava uvjeriti brata da njihova veza nema budućnosti.

programme.title: Prijatelji
programme.desc: (SAD, 2001) Oni su poput druge obitelji. Radnja serije prati šest likova; Rachel, Monicu, Phoebe, Joeyja, Chandlera i Rossa, koji žele ostvariti svoje snove u velikom gradu New Yorku i spontano postanu prijatelji za cijeli život. Rachel se želi baviti modom, Monica sanja o kuharskoj karijeri, Joey daje sve od sebe da postane slavni glumac, Ross je paleontolog koji nikako da ostvari sreću u ljubavi, Phoebe je uistinu imala težak život, no to je ne sprečava da bude jedna od najpozitivnijih osoba u seriji, a Chandler radi u velikoj korporaciji i ima sarkastičan pogled na svijet. Prijatelji doživljavaju brojne komične i romantične avanture, a okosnica njihove zanimljive svakodnevice svakako su odnosi među njima.

programme.title: Prijatelji
programme.desc: (SAD, 2001) Oni su poput druge obitelji. programme.title: Alov svijet
programme.desc: (SAD, 2021) Prijateljstvo između marinca Rileya (Parker Young) i prevoditelja Awalmira (Adhir Kalyan) započelo je u Afganistanu kada je Al (Awalmir) Rileyu pomagao dok je služio vojni rok. Sada se nerazdvojni prijatelji navikavaju na normalan život u Columbusu, u Ohiju. Doselivši se Rileyu, Al upozna njegovog oca Arta (Dean Norris) i suprugu Vanessu (Kelli Goss), od koje se Riley razvodi i koja dobiva skrbništvo nad njihovom kćerkom Hazel (Farrah Mackenzie). Al zna da Rileyu nije lako živjeti bez svojih najbližih dok se pokušava priviknuti na miran život jer su ratne traume ostavile dubok trag. Al pokušava ponovno pomoći svojem prijatelju nastojeći ujediniti njegovu obitelj.

programme.title: Alov svijet

programme.title: To je Voyo
programme.desc: (Hrvatska) Voyo svojim korisnicima pruža jedinstveno iskustvo streamanja - raznovrstan i recentan sadržaj, gledanje bez reklama, fantastičnu opciju da pogledaju svoj omiljeni show 24 sata prije prikazivanja na televiziji te brojne druge mogućnosti! Na novoj RTL-ovoj streaming platformi Voyo korisnici mogu gledati sve RTL-ove kanale uživo, a očekuje ih čak 1500 različitih naslova – širok izbor novih filmova svih žanrova, kao i poznati filmski klasici, strane serije te regionalni hitovi, vrhunski dokumentarci, sportski i glazbeni megaspektakli, najveći reality showovi i bogat dječji sadržaj.

programme.title: CSI: Las Vegas
programme.desc: (SAD, Kanada, 2013) Za vrijeme poslovnog putovanja farmaceut je završio mrtav u muljevitom bazenu. A Hodges, pak, sazna za neugodnu tajnu koju je od njega skrivala zaručnica.

programme.title: CSI: Las Vegas
programme.desc: (SAD, Kanada, 2013) Istjerivač duhova, koji je povezan s ubojstvima starim 20-ak godina, ubijen je dok je istraživao zloglasno mjesto ubojstva nekoliko mladih dječaka. Greg govori Morganu o vidovitim sposobnostima koje je dobio od svoje bake.

programme.title: Kraj programa
programme.desc: (Češka)

programme.title: Gradi(ONA)
programme.desc: (Hrvatska, 2021) Ana-Marija je nedavno preuredila prekrasan tavanski prostor, no nedavni potres stan je jako oštetio. U neku ruku joj je i drago jer sada ga ima priliku ponovno obnoviti. No zbog nesređenih susjedskih odnosa i sporog procesa obnove Zagreba, još se neko vrijeme neće moći primiti posla.

programme.title: Svjetska blaga
programme.desc: (Njemačka) Pratimo UNESCO-v popis svjetske baštine te ga obavijamo nevjerojatnim pričama o našoj ljudskoj povijesti i sudbini. Pod motom "Čuvamo ono što volimo. Volimo ono što razumijemo. Razumijemo ono što smo naučili." UNESCO od 1972. godine diljem svijeta čuva sada već 890 jedinstvenih prirodnih spomenika i onih koji su čovječjih ruku djelo. Serija prati UNESCO-v popis svjetske baštine te ga uz pomoć fantastičnih prizora obavija nevjerojatnim pričama o našoj ljudskoj povijesti i sudbini. Svaka epizoda pruža ne samo impresivnu količinu informacija o našem svijetu, nego i osjećaj za duh svake lokacije te gledateljima nudi nove uvide i poglede. Serija nevjerojatnim pričama otkriva i daje uvid u UNESCO-v popis spomenika svjetske baštine snimajući sve na 35-milimetarskoj vrpci.

programme.title: Zig i Sharko
programme.desc: (Francuska) Na osamljenom vulkanskom otoku, daleko u prostranstvima Tihog oceana živi lukava hijena Zig. Njegovi dani svode se na neprestane pokušaje hvatanja prelijepe sirene crvene kose - Marine, koju čuva Sharko, velika bijela psina. Osim što je njezin tjelohranitelj, on je i zaljubljen u nju, što ga još više tjera da je pod svaku cijenu obrani.

(SAD, Belgija) Uz neobične avanture malih, plavih stvorenja i njihovu borbu protiv zlog čarobnjaka Gargamela, odrastale su generacije diljem svijeta.

programme.title: Sportske igre mladih
programme.desc: Sportske igre mladih najveća su manifestacija za djecu i omladinu na ovim prostorima čiji je osnovni cilj promocija zdravog načina života i prijateljstva. Već dugi niz godina osnovnoškolcima i srednjoškolcima iz Hrvatske, Bosne i Hercegovine te Srbije omogućuje potpuno besplatno sudjelovanje u natjecanjima u deset sportskih disciplina (mali nogomet, odbojka na pijesku, košarka, rukomet, odbojka, igra između dve vatre, stoni tenis, tenis, atletika i šah).
